title: New Recruits
overview: The company hired a young man who was overjoyed by the boss's wife. The boss's wife began to miss him and accidentally discovered that the new employee also had ideas for the boss's wife. While the boss was away, they were even more passionate with the boss's wife in the office. The good times didn't last long. When the boss's wife's sister came to the boss's company due to a breakup, the boss also had ideas for this sister-in-law, and it wasn't just the boss who had sexual interest, And this new employee.
